title: Hate this new aatrox
body: I used to love aatrox I've been playing him since season 6 he was one of the first champs i ever got and i just loved how i could lifesteal and just auto attack and do so much, but when i saw and played this rework, i was utterly disgusted it feels nothing like the new aatrox and riot thinks they've done a brilliant job of this new aatrox without even taking the opinion of previous aatrox mains. Im just here to say screw you riot for ruining one of my favourite champs

replies.body:
You now know how I've felt about Quinn for over 2 years.

Welcome to the club.

I mean I don't *dislike* Quinn now, but the ult really just can't compare. I wish they'd taken her more in the direction of a ranged bruiser like Gnar than kept the semi-ADC route and changed her ult. I liked her old Q better but I also understand why it was problematic. 

The ult I feel was more problematic for her than for anyone else (squishy diving in head first and all that) but still there's nothing quite like turning into a freaking raptor and running em down. Despite being a supp main, Quinn has a special place for me. Phoenix was the first skin I ever bought and Corsair my first ever cosplay :)

I must say, it is a real shame to have her old ult removed from the game.
It was just such a neat ability.

Perhaps she should have had a little more choice in her kit when they reworked her. She could have been a little like Kayn/Kha'Zix/Kai'Sa. In the sense that she gets to choose between upgrading her abilities to favour Valor, a speedy melee burst, or Quinn, a ranged sustained DPS. 

Or maybe she could have gone down the Kindred angle, where you control Quinn as the champ, and Valor is a bit more like a permanent autonomous pet. (maybe even a pet you can switch to by pressing R, and you get a new set of abilities like her old ult, and Quinn becomes the pet for a few seconds? So they are both always on the battlefield, and you switch between them.)

After all she was intended to be released as 'Quinn and Valor' it was a last minute change to name her 'Quinn'. and as it stands, apart from a couple of her abilities being vaguely bird shaped, Valor has next to nothing to do with her anymore. Which is a shame.

Agree with both of you. I'd definitely like to see Riot give Quinn and Valor (Valor in particular) some well deserved attention, and bring their kit more in-line with the concept of a "Ranger Duo", to better reflect their place in the world of Runeterra, rather than the focus being on Quinn and Valor essentially just being a prop.

Got to say, those concepts sound pretty interesting, and I'd honestly like to see them turned into a full concept (who knows, I might do that myself at some point, wouldn't be the first time I've tried to do that for Quinn). Of those, I'd be more inclined towards the "speedy melee burst vs ranged sustain dps" idea, keeping it true to the original Tag Team, allowing the ability to swap between the two throughout the match, but being able to specialise in one like with Kayn/Kha/Kai.

Interestingly, it seems like a lot of these kinds of concepts are for champions whose names start with K. Maybe Riot would be more inclined to give Quinn some love if her name were changed to Kwinn...
I mean, once I got used to him he's not too bad. But I do miss the old aatrox.

I've been playing this game for 7 years and the day aatrox was released I knew he was my favorite champ. This new aatrox completely changes his playstyle, removed his identity, and ruined his voice. You used to be able to jump in and keep fighting no matter what was happening. New aatrox you got to play a mini game with his q and you have to play around his cooldowns which means you cant go as ham as old aatrox. Now whenever my q is on cd I have to run away like a little bitch instead of being able to always fight with W

Before he was a click to win champ. Now he requires a bit of skill/finesse. I think this is an improvement. The Aatrox just before this update was super nerfed anyway; his undying only worked with a full bloodpool. That was a winning element that got cut out. Now he has some nice moves. Good job riot.

you say the aatrox before was super nerfed, even if that was true i wouldn't care you don't understand how demoralizing it is to have one of your favourite champs dissapear into a monster that cant be recognized

I love the new aatrox, the old aatrox was fun for a few days after his release until everyone worked out how to play around him and his pick/win rates just went to almost zero. The new aatrox (unless they nerf him) is just freelo, haven't lost a single game with him yet
Sadly i have to agree. In my time playing him i loved him. I understand he needed a rework but they screwed it up.
I love the new aatrox. I used to get shit on vsing an aatrox but now I shit on them. He's so weak early XD
